Page.name: Ring_Gold
Page.text: A plain gold ring, used as a base for other
Tools required to have: Ring Mold
Prerequisites: Metallurgy, Metal Molding, Silver Molding,

Page.name: Ring_Silver
Page.text: A plain silver ring, used as a base for other
Tools required to have: Ring Mold
Prerequisites: Metallurgy, Metal Molding, Silver Molding,

Page.name: Med_Silver
Page.text: A plain silver medallion, used as a base for
Tools required to have: Medallion Mold
Prerequisites: Metallurgy, Metal Molding, Silver Molding,

Page.name: Med_Gold
Page.text: A plain gold medallion, used as a base for
Tools required to have: Medallion Mold
Prerequisites: Metallurgy, Metal Molding, Silver Molding,

Page.name: P_Ruby
Page.text: A Polished Ruby, embedded in Rings and Medallions
1 Ruby, 2 Water Essences, 1 Gem Sanding Paper.
Tools required to have: Gemstone Hammer and Chisel

Page.name: P_Emer
Page.text: A Polished Emerald, embedded in Rings and
1 Emerald, 2 Water Essences, 1 Gem Sanding Paper.
Tools required to have: Gemstone Hammer and Chisel

Page.name: P_Saph
Page.text: A Polished Sapphire, embedded in Rings and
1 Sapphire, 2 Water Essences, 1 Gem Sanding Paper.
Tools required to have: Gemstone Hammer and Chisel

Page.name: P_Diam
Page.text: A Polished Diamond, embedded in Rings and
1 Diamond, 2 Water Essences, 3 Gem Sanding Paper.
Tools required to have: Gemstone Hammer and Chisel

Page.name: Ring_Isla
Page.text: When used, transports you to Isla Prima.
1 Silver Ring, 1 Polished Emerald, 1 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: Isla Prima Ring Building

Page.name: Ring_Votd
Page.text: Ring of Valley of the Dwarves
When used, transports you to Valley of the Dwarves.
1 Silver Ring, 1 Polished Diamond, 1 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: Valley of the Dwarves Ring Building

Page.name: Ring_Morcraven
Page.text: When used, transports you to Morcraven Marsh.
1 Gold Ring, 2 Polished Sapphire, 8 Magic Essences.

Page.name: Ring_Naralik
Page.text: When used, transports you to Naralik.
1 Silver Ring, 1 Polished Diamond, 2 Fire Essences.

Page.name: Ring_WSC
Page.text: When used, transports you to White Stone.
1 Gold Ring, 1 Polished Emerald, 1 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: White Stone Ring Building

Page.name: Ring_Port
Page.text: When used, transports you to Portland.
1 Gold Ring, 1 Polished Ruby, 1 Fire Essences.

Page.name: Ring_Dp
Page.text: When used, transports you to Desert Pines.
1 Gold Ring, 1 Polished Sapphire, 1 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: Desert Pines Ring Building

Page.name: Ring_Aldath
Page.text: When used, transports you to Aldath.
Cannot be made at this point

Page.name: Ring_Drakensbane
Page.text: When used, transports you to Drakensbane.
Cannot be made at this point

Page.name: Ring_Braigor
Page.text: When used, transports you to Braigor.
Cannot be made at this point

Page.name: Ring_Valunde
Page.text: When used, transports you to Valunde.
Cannot be made at this point

Page.name: Ring_Thalendale
Page.text: When used, transports you to Thalendale.
Cannot be made at this point

Page.name: Ring_Damage
Page.text: When used in combat, it inflicts 15 points of
damage on your opponent. Regardless of defense.
1 Silver Ring, 4 Polished Ruby, 8 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: Ring of Damage Building

Page.name: Ring_Disengagement
Page.text: If used in combat, allows you to flee.
1 Silver Ring, 1 Polished Sapphire, 2 Fire Essences.
Knowledge needed: Ring of Disengagement Building

Page.name: Ring_Power
Page.text: When used in combat, it inflicts 50 points of
damage on your opponent. Regardless of defense.
Note: the process produces 6 rings at a time.
1 Binding Stone, 10 Rings of Damage, 50 Death Essences.

Page.name: Ring_MDestr
Page.text: When used in combat, it removes 20 points of mana
1 Polished Emerald, 1 Silver Ring, 1 Gold Ring,
Knowledge needed: Ring of Mana Destruction

Page.name: Ring_MMDestr
Page.text: When used in combat, it removes 50 points of mana
10 Silver Rings, 50 Magic Essences, 50 Energy Essences,
Knowledge needed: Ring of Massive Mana Destruction

Page.name: Med_Unicorn
Page.text: When worn, it increases your defense by 4.
1 Silver Bar, 1 Silver Medallion, 2 Fire Essences.

Page.name: Med_Sun
Page.text: When worn, it increases your accuracy 4.
1 Gold Bar, 1 Gold Medallion, 2 Fire Essences.

Page.name: Med_Moon
Page.text: When worn, it increases your armor by 4.
1 Polished Sapphire, 1 Silver Medallion, 2 Fire Essences.

Page.name: Med_Stars
Page.text: When worn, it increases your inflicted damage by 4.
1 Polished Ruby, 1 Silver Medallion, 2 Fire Essences.

Page.name: Med_Harv
Page.text: When worn while harvesting, it decreases the tool
breaking chances by 2, increases the experience
Random harvesting events can destroy it.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Gold Bars, 20 Red Toadstools,

Page.name: Med_Heaven
Page.text: When worn, if you have the hellspawn perk, instead
of hellspawning you lose the medallion.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Silver Bars, 20 White Chanterelles,

Page.name: Med_Life
Page.text: Increases your maximum material points by 30.
+2 Armor, 5% chance to heal 25 hp when hit.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Enriched Life Essences, 10 Turquoise
Knowledge needed: Medallion of Life Building

Page.name: Med_Mana
Page.text: Increases your maximum ethereal points by 20.
1 Seridium Bar, 2 Enriched Magic Essences, 20 Turquoise
Knowledge needed: Medallion of Mana Building

Page.name: Med_Gather
Page.text: When worn, it increases your armor by 2. When
killing an opponent, if you did the most damage,
the items dropped are added to your inventory.
